text: Preheat the oven to 350ºF/180ºC.  Combine the cream and vanilla bean over a medium-high heat in a large saucepan. Stir until the mixture comes to a slight boil. Whisk the egg yolks and sugar together in a large bowl.  Carefully whisk the hot cream mixture into the eggs. Remove and discard the vanilla bean. Add and whisk in the coffee syrup into the bowl.  Use a strainer to remove any lumps from the custard.  Pour the custard into 6 (5 ounce) ramekins. Water bath the ramekins, covered in loose foil for about 25 minutes. Remove from heat and cool. Refrigerate the custards to chill.  Serve with about a tablespoon of sugar, brûléed with a torch.
